mapper.select: SELECT 本.本ID as "book.bookNumber.value", 本.タイトル as "book.title.value", 本.著者 as "book.author.value", 本.本種別 as "book.bookType", (SELECT count(*) FROM 貸出可能 INNER JOIN 蔵書 on 貸出可能.蔵書コード = 蔵書.蔵書コード WHERE 蔵書.本ID = 本.本ID) as "loanability" FROM 本 WHERE 本.タイトル || 本.著者 LIKE '%' || #{keyword.value} || '%' ORDER BY 本.タイトル LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT 本.本ID as "bookNumber.value", 本.タイトル as "title.value", 本.著者 as "author.value", 本.本種別 as "bookType" FROM 本 WHERE 本.本ID = #{bookNumber.value}
